thread.title_full: Phoenix Tiger for Sir Bruce Trophy

title: Phoenix Tiger for Sir Bruce Trophy
text:
Phoenix Tiger for Sir Bruce Trophy By Prakash Gosavi | Posted 10-Oct-2015 
PUNE: With the Nanoli Pune Derby weekend finally here, a sumptuous treat has been planned for racegoers, most of whom will be visiting the Peshwa city from Mumbai and other racing centers in the country. Both Saturday and Sunday will feature well-filled ten-race cards, the Sir Bruce Trophy for class I horses slated as the feature event of today's card. Phoenix Tiger, trained by Dallas Todywalla and to be ridden by S Zervan, is tipped to win the race. 
First race at 1 pm.Selections: 
Vinayak Trophy - Div II (Class V; 1600m)Sanam 1, Sophia 2, Move In Time 3.Sir Bruce Trophy (Class I; 1400m)Phoenix Tiger 1, Simply Sweet 2. 
F A & K A Irani Trophy (Class II; 1000m)Valentino 1, Ravello 2, Another Conquest 3. 
Indictment Double Stakes (class II; 2000m)The Unicorn 1, Snowing 2, Westphalia 3. 
N K Pudumjee Trophy - Div II (For 3y, maidens; 1000m)Winning Girl 1, Forever Yours 2, Alley Bleue 3. 
Roedl & Partner Trophy (Class III; 1600m)Airco 1, Toofan 2, Frankanella 3. 
Samson Controls Trophy - Div II (Class IV; 1400m)Magic In The Air 1, Grand Vitesse 2, Jacknife 3. 
Vinayak Trophy - Div I (Class V; 1600m)Dia 1, The Other Song 2, Running Cloud 3. 
N K Pudumjee Trophy - Div I (For 3y, maidens; 1000m) Shivalik Story 1, Undisputed 2, Shades Of Glory 3. 
Samson Controls Trophy - Div I (Class IV; 1400m) Speed Of Sound 1, Jeannine 2, Multinational 3. 
RecommendationsBest bet: Phonenix Tiger (2-4)Good bet: Shivalik Story (9-11)Chance bet: Speed Of Sound (10-3)Upset: Helping Hand (4-3)
